ResourceHeader.Description: This data product contains 1-s overlapped averages of solar wind magnetic field data taken by the IMPACT/Magnetometer on STEREO-A. The interface allows selection of STEREO A or STEREO B data and of vector quantities in RTN or spacecraft coordinates. It also allows selection of either of two parameter sets: [Bx, By, Bz, |B|] or [RBx, RBy, RBz, |B|, cone and clock angles]. Further, the interface enables easy migration between plot vs. ASCII data presentation options and among the three available resolutions (1, 8, 32 Hz).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the IMPACT PI, Dr. Janet Luhmann (UCB), and the Key Persons for the IMPACT Magnetometer (C. Smith, Bartol) and the late M. Acuna (GSFC).

InformationURL.Name: IMPACT MAG data-descriptive page at UCLA page

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Please acknowledge the IMPACT PI, Dr. Janet Luhmann (UCB), the Key Persons for IMPACT/MAG, Drs. C. Smith (Bartol) and the late M. Acuna (GSFC), and Dr. C.T. Russell for the data interface.

TimeSpan.Note: As of June 23, 2009, last data were for December 31, 2008.
